data.actual_result: It searches for `HelloDabbit` (without any space), breaking the search completely. You can notice that by looking at your search history after reopening search
data.short_description: Searching messages with multiple keywords is broken (spaces between words are removed)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Search menu in any server - Enter two or more keywords separated with spaces and submit, for example `Hello Dabbit` in Discord Testers
